reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and flattering, with one noting it hugs in all the right places. Moreover, the material is thick, stretchy, and never goes out of style. Additionally, they appreciate its versatility, with one mentioning it can be dressed down or up, and another noting it works well from fall to spring. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, Pretty, Versatile Dress
items.body: I am a little over 7 months pregnant and wore this for my baby shower in the navy color. I am usually a size Large in most things pre-pregnancy, and right now at 7 months pregnant I am 5ft tall, about 180 pounds. I am alsow very busty, before pregnancy I am a 34FF in bras. This dress is flattering especially because of the ribbed material. The square neckline is perfect and doesn't show too much. It is comfortable and the material is soft, not itchy or anything. Dress is very stretchy and did not sit too tightly even on my baby bump, in fact most could probably easily size down especially if you really want a form fitting style and/or are not pregnant lol. I'll probably be able to wear this after pregnancy too but if I could for sure size down for a tighter fit if I wanted to Read more
items.author: jodie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Form fitting and good material!
items.body: Gorgeous and so comfortable for my special surprise engagement! Size S fit well! I put it in the dryer on high for a slightly tighter fit and it was perfect. Read more
items.author: Christine Martin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and Thick Material but Not Hot
items.body: Flattering and comfortable. I bought in navy and it is a true navy. I am 5’6 and 160 pounds. A medium fit great and I had plenty of room. It was not skin tight or super body skimming which I like but higher curves in the right areas without showing fat bumps or love handles. The length hit a few inches above the ankle. I plan to buy in other colors. Read more
items.author: kris

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fine rib knit dress, would
items.body: Ordered my normal size S in this despite being 28 weeks pregnant (pre-pregnancy 5’6” 130 lb.) This dress was just fine and the quality seemed good with nice stretch and comfort. Was pleasantly surprised by the length of the sleeves because long sleeves are typically too short on me! The cut and color just wasn’t what I was looking for and I ultimately decided to return it. Read more
items.author: Madeline Rhomberg

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: I love this dress! I am 5’8” and about 130 lbs and the medium fits like a glove. The length goes down to my ankles which is what I was looking for. I would size up if you don’t want a snug fit. The fabric is stretchy and thick enough to hide the lines from your undergarments. I did order the black one so I can’t speak if the lighter colors are see through. The weight of it feels like you could wear it from fall to spring. I am getting ready to order another in a different color. Read more
items.author: Karen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a must have piece that never goes out of style!
items.body: Absolutely love this dress! Great quality, flattering, and even though the length is longer, it comfortable to walk around in and looks great with boots. The look never goes out of style. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most comfortable dress!
items.body: I was looking for a dress for my gender reveal, I purchased the blue one because I loved the color in the pictures. I also wanted to wear the color I thought baby was going to be, and I was right! Everybody kept saying how nice the dress was, asking where I got it and that it fit beautifully. Im not normally one to wear dresses because im not that much of a girly girl, but this dress was so comfy, stretchy and kept me warm because of the thicker material. I will definitely be purchasing more dresses from this brand. Highly recommend, 10/10! Read more
items.author: Dakota Vigh

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok
items.body: The pink wasn’t flattering and was see through. Read more
items.author: Jordan

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Navy, Khaki, Grey Blue, Black, Light Pink, Coffee, Heather Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
